comments: 4Geeks was really a great experience. The environment is very much everyone working together, with lots of opportunities to code as a group
4geeks has some of the best and most supportive staff that I've ever experienced in my life. The 24/7 support chat and the 1-1 mentoring helped me make it through
The number of opportunities to get assistance, either in coding or to get a career are hard to miss. You need help, just ask and you will get it!
I've gotten further than I have ever gotten by myself watching videos on youtube or the classes I did in college. This has been amazing for my growth and interest in the development field
I think this is a solid platform to learn coding, it is worth every penny that is being spent. I already recommended it to friend and family.
